articles.title: Destiny 2’s Even Slower Episodic Storytelling Is Not Working In ‘Echoes’ - Forbes
articles.description: I am currently that GIF of Larry David tilting his head back and forth as I try to figure out if I like Destiny 2’s new Episodes or not.
articles.content:
Destiny 2 Echoes
Bungie
I am currently that GIF of Larry David tilting his head back and forth as I try to figure out if I like Destiny 2s new Episodes or not. The volume of content is there, and I… [+2665 chars]

articles.author: Catherine Lewis
articles.title: GTA 6 won't be "wildly different" from GTA 5, former Rockstar dev predicts: "I think maybe people might be a little disappointed on the first day" - Gamesradar
articles.description: "But it's still gonna be the best game out there"
articles.content: Former Rockstar Games developer Obbe Vermeij has been sharing his thoughts on Grand Theft Auto 6 and how he thinks it's going to go down with fans, and he believes that it's "going to be the best gam… [+2030 chars]
